title: Replace X post URLs with plain text while preserving embeds

requirements.text: In the MessageBubble component, replace all X post URLs in message text with the plain text 'X Post' (non-clickable) while preserving the embedded X post previews below the message text

quotes: Can you just remove the x post links and just add text that says 'X Post'
1. Plain text 2. Yes 3. All existing messages
Don't remove the actual x post embed though

acceptanceCriteria: X post URLs in message text are replaced with the plain text 'X Post'
The text 'X Post' is not clickable or linked
Embedded X post previews continue to display below the message
Change applies to all existing messages containing X post URLs
Twitter widget rendering functionality remains intact

constraints: Do not modify the Twitter embed rendering logic
Do not change backend message storage or data structures
Preserve all other message formatting and link handling
nonGoals: Changing how X post embeds are rendered
Modifying URL detection or validation logic
Applying this change to YouTube or Twitch links
